Package xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubdev

Class PubDevRESTClient

java.lang.Object
xyz.rk0cc.willpub.pubdev.PubDevRESTClient
public final class PubDevRESTClient extends Object
Client for fetching package information in with given PubDevRepository.
Since:
1.0.0

  • Field Details

    • HTTP_1_1_REQUEST_MODE

      public static boolean HTTP_1_1_REQUEST_MODE
      A Boolean field to make request in HTTP 1.1 instead of HTTP 2 if unsupported. It is false by default.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • search

      @Nonnull public PubSearchResult search(@Nonnull String query, @Nonnegative long page, @Nonnull PubDevRepository.SearchOrdering ordering) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Give a search result of the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      query - Search query.
      page - Page number.
      ordering - Prefer searching order.
      Returns:
      Result of this search. If no related package found in this search, the package list will return with empty List.
      Throws:
      IOException - When some IO error occurred during sending state.
      InterruptedException - When interrupted when requesting data.

    • searchNextPage

      @Nonnull public PubSearchResult searchNextPage(@Nonnull PubSearchResult result) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Give the next page of existed search result.
      Parameters:
      result - Existed result for fetching next page context.
      Returns:
      Next page of PubSearchResult. If no related package found in this search, the package list will return with empty List.
      Throws:
      IOException - When some IO error occurred during sending state.
      InterruptedException - When interrupted when requesting data.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If reached the last page of search result.

    • searchPreviousPage

      @Nonnull public PubSearchResult searchPreviousPage(@Nonnull PubSearchResult result) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Give the previous page of existed search result.
      Parameters:
      result - Existed result for fetching previous page context.
      Returns:
      Previous page of PubSearchResult. If no related package found in this search, the package list will return with empty List.
      Throws:
      IOException - When some IO error occurred during sending state.
      InterruptedException - When interrupted when requesting data.
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - If reached the first page of search result.

    • applyPackage

      @Nonnull public PubDevRESTClient applyPackage(@Nonnull PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository packageRepo)
      Assign package repository for fetching information in PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository.
      The PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository can be assigned directly or indirectly from PubDevRepository.fetchPackage(String). However, direct assign will have higher chance to throw an exception if the package has not been hosted yet.
      Indirect apply is lower risk than direct one but vary depending on how to apply package name from PubSearchResult.PubSearchContext.packages() which is an unmodifiable List.
      The best way to get package name (assume user don't know List's items) is getting index of the item first, then call List.get(int).
      Parameters:
      packageRepo - Package repository will be uses for fetching package information.
      Returns:
      Same object of PubDevRESTClient allows to chain the method to finish a request.
      Throws:
      PubUnfetchableException - When calculated hashcode of PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository is different with the current applied repository in PubDevRESTClient.
      See Also:
      • unapplyPackage()

    • unapplyPackage

      @Nonnull public PubDevRESTClient unapplyPackage()
      Clear existed package repository in PubDevRESTClient.
      This method will remove PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository with no other repository applied which no package request allowed after this method invoked.
      Returns:
      Same object of PubDevRESTClient allows to chain the method to finish a request.
      See Also:
      • applyPackage(PubDevRepository.PubDevPackageResultRepository)

    • packageInfo

      @Nonnull public PubPkgInfo packageInfo() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Crawl package information with some basic data provided.
      Returns:

      Throws:
